word_mean: 构象：化学上，一个分子中原子在围绕单键旋转而形成的空间构型，这种特性使不同构型(异构体)互相区别

sentence.Network_en: The periodic buckling leaves the fibre in a waved conformation.
sentence.Network_cn: 周期性的弯折在纤维中造成波形构成.

sentence.Network_en: In amphibole asbestos the constiuent atoms are arranged in chain - like conformation.
sentence.Network_cn: 在闪石类石棉中,组成的原子呈链状排列.

sentence.Network_en: This still says nothing about the conformation of the chain.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 构象(Conformation)：构象则是对C-C单键内旋转异构体的一种描述，有伸展型、无规线团、螺旋型和折叠链等几种构象。 光学异构体(…

confocal 同焦点的conformation 构造，组成conformator 头轮廓测量器

list.abs: 英语常见词根前缀后缀大全 ... reform 改革 conform 符合 grateful 衷心感谢的.
托福单词表 - 豆丁网 ... confine 限制 conform 遵守。 confront 面对，直接对抗.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... conform v 使一致；遵从 conformity n 一致，相符 deform v 使残废；变形.
道路工程英语词汇_专业词汇_专业英语_食品伙伴网 ... 确定，决定 definition 合格 conformity 不合格 nonconformity.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent. (in the sense 'conforming, adaptation'): from Latin conformatio(n-), from conformare 'to shape, fashion' (see conform)

means.word_mean: 1. a symmetrical arrangement of the parts of a thing
2. any spatial attributes (especially as defined by outline);

sentences.sentence: "he could barely make out their shapes through the smoke"

means.word_mean: 3. acting according to certain accepted standards

auth_sentence.content: Structure and conformation dynamics of riboswitches in genetic regulation.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Structure and conformation dynamics of riboswitches in genetic regulation.

Sentence.sentence: Conformation occurs when others treat you in a manner consistent with who you believe you are.
